Document.TEXT: Fast Market Research Global MEMs Pressure Sensor Market 2016-2020 - New Market Study Published Fast Market Research announces the availability of the new TechNavio report, Global MEMs Pressure Sensor Market 2016-2020, on their comprehensive research portal Boston, MA -- ( SBWIRE ) -- 02/10/2016 -- Micro-Electro-Mechanical System (MEMS) pressure sensors provide an interface that can sense, process, and control the external environment of the system on which they are installed. These devices contain tiny electrical and mechanical components on a single chip, and work on the principle of change in resonant frequency to calculate pressure. Technavio's analysts forecast the global MEMS pressure sensors market to grow at a CAGR of 13.82% during the period 2016-2020. Covered in this report The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global MEMS pressure sensors market for 2016-2020. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of MEMS pressure sensors to the following customer segments: Get More Details on this Report and a Full Table of Contents at Global MEMs Pressure Sensor Market 2016-2020 -Automotive -Industrial -Healthcare -Others Technavio's report, Global MEMS Pressure Sensors Market 2016-2020, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects over the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
